website_summaries.verdict: Well-crafted 47 mm dive watch from a renowned manufacturer. It's wearable for up to 2 hours in 30-meter depth.
pros: ISO-certified dive watch with inner dial sun ray styling, analog display, date window, and depth measurements
Eco drive technology – never needs batteries
Easy buckle closure and mineral crystal protective window over face
Water-resistant to 990', can scuba dive with this watch
cons: One buyer was advised by a repair facility that the energy cell needs replacing every 5-7 years, and gaskets every 2-3 years
Plastic band has failed some wearers
Illuminated dial feature also has its limitations, so may not work well on night dives

customer_reviews.title: Definite Yes
customer_reviews.text: For approx. $160 you can't go wrong. Only complaint I would have is that I wish there was an extra loop on the rubber wrist band to hold the free end of the band once buckled in place. Other than that, very sharp looking watch. Beefy, great luminescence at night once you've lit it up with a flash light. Masculine look and feel. Plus the solar power (Eco-drive) for it means never replacing a battery. Keeps time perfectly. Have not had to adjust it a single time - no seconds gain/loss month to month.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Glad i got it.
customer_reviews.text: A very long strap but being a diver to 300m it's understandable. It's a great tool watch but had more uses then swimming. Because of the styling and dial structure it can definitely go into an office setting and a night on the town. The date has gotten the biggest complaint but I have no problem with it. Easy to set time and date, and another worth the investment. When your wrist is sweaty or wet the strap will rotate ad expected, but that's really it. Glad it's solar so never have to worry about the battery or winding!
customer_reviews.author: N. JonesTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a diver and has always wanted this watch. I got it for him for Fathers Day and he loves it!!! I did some research on the best dive watches from different dive sites and it was right up there with Rolex and some of the other “big boys”! Great price point and great quality! What more could you ask for? Not wanting to wear it just for diving, he puts it on anytime he isn’t working. He has yet to dive with it, but knows it will be fabulous. The case was amazing too and so creative!!! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Peri Wood

customer_reviews.title: I really like this watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. Looks great in person. The face is very scratch resistant as well I've dropped it several times and no scratches yet. Literally, my only complaint with the watch are the belt loops tend to work their way down the strap until they slip down where the strap overlaps. This seems to be more of an issue with this watch than most of my others. I think it may be due to the rubber used in the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Scubasteve

customer_reviews.title: Love mine, bought one for my son
customer_reviews.text: Eco drive rocks, no battery, no automatic. Great lume in the dark. Used as a dive watch, it's rugged and large enough. Can't get a better dive watch for the money! Rubber strap for easy change from bathing suit to wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: beautiful waterproof timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: this beautiful timepiece not only does it have sleek lines and elegance but it's also waterproof. so go ahead take a dip in the pool or swim in the beach don't be afraid to get it wet with this sleek beautiful timepiece from citizens watch. this watch has echo drive system you'll never need a battery. it recharges the rechargeable battery through light or sunlight. just like a solar panel it recharges the battery I rated it.. 5*****STARS*****5
customer_reviews.author: JET3

customer_reviews.title: Big, but not too big
customer_reviews.text: Sure, it's larger and heavier that my every day Seiko, but I expected that. I don't think the band is long enough to fit around a 7mm wetsuit with 5mm gloves without an extension. After working in tghe sun for a few hours, the dial was still visible in the dark several hours later. I will be diving with it in a couple weeks so I'll update this review afterwards if I then have anything to add.
customer_reviews.author: Deer HunterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Takes time for initial charge - Great overall watch
customer_reviews.text: It took about 2 days to get a full charge; when the battery is low, the sweep hand advances 2 seconds at a time. Once charged, it's been keeping time very accurately, which is expected from a quartz movement. The band is long, but I have a big wrist and it fits well. Its a heavy watch which feels substantial. The dial is a good change from standard solid backgrounds. It's easy to read, so that's not an issue. at this price point, its a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: It keeps great time. Which
customer_reviews.text: I had a Seiko that was just a lemon. Had to return in three times before I finally threw a fit and had amazon give me a credit towards something else. This was the something else. It keeps great time. Which, was really what annoyed me about the Seiko. This is a bit larger than I'd prefer but I wear it most every day. I mainly got this because I do open water swimming and I can read it even in rough seas. Great watch. Very tough. Tells time. Goes underwater. What else do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Pamazon

customer_reviews.title: Love the lume glow.  Very well lit and doesn't take a lot of light to get it to glow.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were in the 49-50mm dial size and had a bit more weight to it. Maybe if the band was bigger or heavier. All in all it is a good dive watch. Not many watches out there rated to 300 atm (that's 1000 feet folks) at this price. If you are on the fence, go for it. Seems sturdy and the price is right. Hint: slide a nickel under the band loops and they will stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Ziebell

customer_reviews.title: Another good watch by Citizen
customer_reviews.text: Just does what it’s supposed to do, not fancy but looks great, usually the bands are to small but this one has length. Can’t wait to test it out in the water, then I can really like it if it does what others say. Very nice watch for the price but I like Citizen watches.
customer_reviews.author: doctdc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking watch! My husband put it on and started wearing it immediately. Since it was a Christmas present, he has not gone diving with it. One thing, it came inside what was supposed to look like a diver's oxygen tank. When I opened the very nice box the "tank" came in, I was confused. I thought I had ordered the wrong item. I don't recall seeing the tank on the website. I actually showed it to my husband. He pulled the tank up from its base and exclaimed 'It's a watch!' All I could say was Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: K. Beauchemin

customer_reviews.title: I like this watch but....
customer_reviews.text: So I really like this watch, but it will not keep the date accurately. It keeps the time fine, but after 2 weeks, the date falls behind. I thought I was setting it wrong, but after the 4th time, I made sure I was setting the date and then making sure I set the time in the right format (am/pm) and 2 weeks later (marked it on my calendar when I corrected the date) it was a day behind. I still give it 4 stars as I can't really see the date with out my reading glasses and I don't wear them all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Randall B

customer_reviews.title: Citizen Mens BN0085
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping! Great value for a quality watch! Accurate and easy to read! Highly recommend for swimming, diving, outdoor sports, etc.! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: edman48

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch but can be improved
customer_reviews.text: Had this watch once before, kept great time but had issues with the date never being right. So decided not to have it repaired and to just buy a new one. Nice watch, but they need to put a magnifier window over the date and make it smarter so you don't have to adjust the date if the month isn't 31 days. Other than that it's easy to read in the dark and looks good. No complaints about the band.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. Solidly built but fits and wears very comfortably with the silicone rubber strap. The lume has a nice 2 tone and when exposed to direct light is bright and clear. The intense brightness doesn’t last too long but you are able to tell time after many hours. My only gripe is the date window is a little small and it’s deep below the face so if you’re not looking at it directly from the top it can be hard to read. Overall a great watch with very good water resistance (300m).
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: CITIZEN WORKS!!!SEIKO CONSISTENTLY QUITS
customer_reviews.text: Replacing the SEIKO PROSPEX. SEIKO QUIT 2X in 3 years. Never ever kept accurate time. This Citizen watch has the same rugged to 660ft down and intense heft ( I use it for outdoor ruggedness to +15,555ft. A handsome “manly” watch that is simple, consistent and affordable. CITIZEN YES, SEIKO NO! Great quick AMZN DELIVERY AS PROMISED.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Reginato

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for a fabulous price
customer_reviews.text: My husband had one for many years. However, the band broke he sent it out to get fixed. I purchased one through Amazon and I’d have to say, he should not spent that money fixing it because the purchase I made and what I paid was great!
customer_reviews.author: Susana Cannavo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Good looking watch. Appears well made. This is the first watch I've owned at this high of a price. The band is long but it is supposed to be able to fit over your wrist in a wet suit. A bit of a pain, but by no means a deal breaker. The luminescence glows for a few hours at least, if charged in the light first. I'm not a diver but I got one because I reasoned that it would have to be well made to withstand that type of water pressure. I may be mistaken but looks great. We'll pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: jaredp

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The only negative I have is the band! I think Citizen could have done a better job here. This however is not a deal breaker! The watch itself is fantastic. I would expect nothing less from Citizen. I own a smaller eco-drive watch I have had for years. That watch has taken a beating and has never failed me. I expect nothing less from this watch!! I am very happy with my new diver. No Batteries No Fuss No worries!!! I recommend this watch highly!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch. Environment Conscious Packaging Required.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive watch at an affordable price. Lost a star because of the packaging, although impressive and attractive being a dive watch i felt that it could have been more sensitive to conservation and the use of plastics.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My husband owned this watch and unfortunately lost it. Said he could not live without a replacement. He will never own anything else that is not a eco-drive. He scuba dives and was so happy with it's bright clarity underwater and the styling without a bunch of other dials on the face. Quality flat rubber strap also. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janeo

customer_reviews.title: A Really Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is bold, beautiful and elegant. One of my favorite Citizen watches. A very clean, smart looking watch. Simple and easy to read with great luminescence that lasts all night. I really like the contrast between the green luminescent hands and the blue hour markers. With quartz accuracy and never having to change a battery this watch is a real winner. With a 47mm case diameter and a 14mm case thickness I was concerned that the watch might be too big. While it is bigger than my other watches, it fits really well and does not overpower my arm. It looks great proportionally and the watch band is really comfortable. I highly recommend this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Beach

customer_reviews.title: I really like this watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. I bought it for scuba diving, but even though it is big and somewhat heavy, I wear it every day with no issues. I have planned a dive trip for December and will update my review after.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Big D

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great! I used it on vacation and have done many dives with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is nicer in person than the pictures show. Descent lume, nice bezel action and the seconds hand lines up perfectly with each tick. The chapter ring is allso on the mark. The strap is soft and plyable and long enough to go over my wetsuit. I would highly recommended this watch. I would of given five stars but I think the shiny parts on the side would be better matte.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I needed a less expensive, water resistant watch for a recent trip to Mexico and I was pleasantly surprised. This watch is nice-looking and has a good heft to it. Simple, looks good at work, on the beach or in the pool. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a basic, every day watch...and at this price you really don't have to worry about banging it around.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I had to admit i sent this watch back. I do wish i had kept on to it. A very nice looking watch . Good feel and quality. I will have to reorder this watch. We all make mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Daffyduck777

customer_reviews.title: My go to watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. I travel a lot and work in rough environments. This watch I know will stand up to the beating and look good while doing it. Can't go wrong with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: mrmcc916

customer_reviews.title: Great eco drive style!
customer_reviews.text: The watch really looks great. A slightly different shape to my other divers. The rubber band is a bit underwhelming. I immediately and easily changed it to a black nato. The luminous markings are very bright in the dark. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! I love this one. Like other reviewers have said, it looks a lot better in your hand than in pictures. Feels very, very solid and yet, not too heavy. The lume is awesome! Very bright for a few minutes after light exposure and then it fades over a couple of hours; still, you can tell the time in, say, a dark theater with ease. Only thing I don't really like is the fact that there seems not to be any aftermarket bands available for this model; it is very comfortable but I'm partial to Nato bands. That said, it is a great watch and I don't hesitate to recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Buenfil Santana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great big size solar diving watch. Heavy and well made!
customer_reviews.author: KEN TELLS ALL

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is fairly heavy but comfortable on my wrist. I have relatively small wrists for a male but it feels great and isn't too big. The band is very long but then again it helps if youre putting it on over a wetsuit when diving or surfing, etc but it doesnt get in the way or come loose. The band is very thin but it is far from cheap and flimsy. Overall for the price it is a great diving watch, I would reccomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Citizens Eco-Drive Diver's
customer_reviews.text: Great Diver's watch, heavy case, the bracelet feels nice on the wrist. Luminous hands are great at night. Setting of date a little complicated but if you follow the instruction is a done deal. Great watch overall.
customer_reviews.author: Caviles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dive watch
customer_reviews.text: The time is easy to read but the date is almost impossible. The date could be twice its size, there is enough room to make it larger.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann A. Faux

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this watch for Christmas. He loves it..comes in a funny little plastic scuba diving tank packaging!! Nice looking, glow in the dark
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: one of the best for the price
customer_reviews.text: The fact that at $165 it is 300 M water resist and Scuba certified makes it a very good deal compared to 200 M WR from Citizen & others.
customer_reviews.author: Dan meyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch exceed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch I'm not a diver but needed a waterproof watch to wear while fishing and hunting my hands are in the water a lot especially when fishing. Had very bad luck with "water resistant" watches, looking forward to YEARS of use from this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, very nice quality, only complaint I have is that the two keepers to keep the exceed band from flopping around don't stay in place so I am constantly adjusting it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this watch. As you may have noticed for other reviews my only complaint is that the strap is a bit long but just a bit of superglue on one of the holders is an easy fix. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: We first saw this watch on our cruise ship, and my husband came close to purchasing it. We went on Amazon and found it less expensive. We purchased it through one of Amazon's sellers and could not have been more pleased. The watch picture does not do it justice. You have to see it to appreciate the quality.
customer_reviews.author: mka356

customer_reviews.title: awesomd watch!
customer_reviews.text: I work in healthcare. I had been wearing what I considered a nice but rugged watch before this one, a Luminox. It got water in it from hand washing after about 5 years. This Citizen has blown away the Luminox. The screw-down crown is actually water proof...not resistant. I even accidentally walked into an MRI room and it still works great! It also looks great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cliffton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Keeps time, not too heavy, and looks nice enough for casual or dress wear.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch with a bit of weight that I don't mind. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch with all the function I was looking for, a quality product by citizen.
customer_reviews.author: depaul7

customer_reviews.title: Watch band broke and wasn't covered by the warranty
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch, but the band was defective and broke after a little more than a year under normal wear and tear and wasn't covered by the warranty. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Connors

customer_reviews.title: Watch band too long.
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks good, but the band is too long and it looks like band maybe more suited to people with large wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Bigdeli

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, has a 4 star for easy to read because you can’t see the date Love the packaging
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Royer

customer_reviews.title: Solid beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect watch on land and for scuba diving. Solidly built. I bought this citizen watch for my son because I have owned the same model for many years. My watch never let me down and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's work good..
customer_reviews.text: thank you so much this is the right one. it's work good..
customer_reviews.author: mac mac

customer_reviews.title: Good Second hand watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks good easy to read but the strap is way too long
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Beadles

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. My husband needed a replacement for his old watch and this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Karen Zindel

customer_reviews.title: Super Watch
customer_reviews.text: Already own an Eco Drive dress watch and very much like the lack of batteries and accuracy. Wanted an accurate, durable, easy to maintain dive watch at a reasonable price. This one fills the bill. Much better than the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Like it so much I bought two !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this watch. The quality and style. Such a good bargain I bought another one for my friends birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriston

customer_reviews.title: Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Need to find a way to fix date discrepancies. Beautiful watch though. Bought 3 for the groomsmen. Buying my own after seeing their gift come in.
customer_reviews.author: Steve freels

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for a week so have not been in water with it but it looks great and feels good when wearing it. So far it has been accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: I love the clean
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this watch. I love the clean, simple look and style. I have normal sized wrists and the size of the case is perfect. I get compliments all the time on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch, plus the ease of Ecodrive
customer_reviews.text: Citizen Ecodrive watches are my preferred timepiece. This model is solidly built and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Citizen to replace another diver's watch that ran on batteries. I bought this model because of the Eco Drive feature. I've lost two watches due to the o rings being replaced after several years and both leaked afterward. I'm glad I no longer have to cross my fingers and hope for the best anymore. After a month, I really like the watch. It's tough, accurate, comfortable, and attractive. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this watch
customer_reviews.text: Solid and keeps time perfectly. Great looking too. Strap is long but it is a 300 meter dive watch so should fit over a wet suit
customer_reviews.author: Henry M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic looking, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, not too big, looks good no matter where I am going, capable of diving deeper that I ever will.
customer_reviews.author: John Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! Great look and feel without being pretentious
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This watch it’s great and looks even better in person
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and impressive clock But if the strip is torn, replace it with a very expensive
customer_reviews.author: RASON THUBERI

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Very classy, 300m water resistant that is vat I wanted. The strap is a little bit big for me , but it's OK
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gugel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, not too big ( and I have small wrists) and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W. Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Whats not to love? Nice sized face, rubber band, water proof, doesn't need batteries, florescent dials, and Citizen quality. Great watch for every day stuff. I have another dress watch, but you could dress this one up too. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Reimer

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch. I do not like the band. It is very plyable and long. It could stand to be 1/2 inch shorter and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sturdy watch. Nice quality. Great for any type of wear from sports to casual to office.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my battery operated 200M Citizen. It was 15 years old and the threaded barrel for tightening down the adjusting pin stripped and Citizen wanted $300 to repair. This watch looks great but is very heavy and the date window is deep, sometimes making it difficult to see in certain lighting conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: All in all a good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Nighttime glow doesn't glow for too long... And bezel slips if you knock it underwater.. But I rely more on my Dive Computer for this that the watch for this - so all in all a good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Tong

customer_reviews.title: Meets all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: My previous watch was a Citizen eco-drive and it lasted 10 years before not being able to hold a charge consistently. I wanted a watch with a little larger face and this one fits the bill. The styling is a little more dressy than I would have preferred (for my lifestyle anyway), which is why I rated it 4 instead of 5 stars. It does look very good though, and I'm happy with my purchase. I've had it only for a couple weeks, but exposures in the pool, shower, and in heavy rain have not caused any problems.
customer_reviews.author: K. R. Bois

customer_reviews.title: What time is it
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a couple months, trying to figure out the warranty process. I just want to know what time it is
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cawdrey

customer_reviews.title: Its also beautiful and light weight for a divers watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a real divers watch. Its also beautiful and light weight for a divers watch. People notice the watch for its appeal and I receive many compliments. The illumination is the best ever. The solar function works perfectly. The watch can run for 6 months without sunlight. They crystal is off the charts and the bevel protects it. I have owned divers watches for 40 years - this is the best ever. I love my watch. And finally - its the cheapest real divers watch made by Citizen. You don't have to spend more to get perfection.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice watch and fair for the price. I didn’t like the looks of the Seiko Solar divers In this price range and chose Citizen because of that. I still don’t think Citizen can match the quality and durability of Seiko.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Vietor

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch !!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for nearly 2 weeks for the best watch that fit all the objectives of my search and I came across this time piece. This watch is handsome as well as accurate. The watch is a little big, but I have a pretty thick wrist so it fits appropriately. The band has a comfortable feel to it. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Magnowski

customer_reviews.title: GSmith
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure that the watch works perfectly but it was just to big for my wrist. So I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: G Smith

customer_reviews.title: I mean it's fine but the strap is unnecessarily too long
customer_reviews.text: The watch is not exactly what I expected knowing Citizens. I mean it's fine but the strap is unnecessarily too long...if your wrist is not huge it would go round! It feels awkward. I took delivery of it today and I can assure you I'd return it!!
customer_reviews.author: Omamegbe

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for taller guys!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband. He wanted a cool looking sports watch that didn't look like a child's watch on him - he is 6'6. He had tried on a few "fashion" watches at a department store and they barely fit around his wrist. He loves Citizens and although I was hesitant to buy a watch online, this was perfect! The watch is heavy and the face elevates nicely off the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks better in the picture. The bezel looks like plastic, the specs says otherwise but the bezel makes it look cheap. The wrist band is too long. I know it is to go over your wet suit but I don't wear a wet suit 24/7. Placed a few O-rings on the band and that seems to work to hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: W. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: The strap is useless. Its flat instead rippled so it sweats
customer_reviews.text: Its not 47 mm case as advertised, evidently they also included the bezel. The strap is useless. Its flat instead rippled so it sweats, not to say the rippled ones don't but the band is irritating. The belt rides out of the loops and I am constantly having to pull the belt. The date is unreadable being too small. I do like the solid hour hands and it is excellent in the dark. I have owned dive watches: Invicta, Timex and Rolex Submariner and was looking for a watch that did not need a battery, or cost a fortune to clean and repair (Rolex).
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: The luminescent sucks not as advertised and the band broke in less ...
customer_reviews.text: The luminescent sucks not as advertised and the band broke in less than a week,for that kind of money you would expect more quality than that I'm very disappointed .I ordered a more expensive sieko hope it's a better watch.Never buy another Citizen again though
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Big heavy thick lovely accurate watch.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a week but I like it very much so far. My old traser was getting pretty dim and the big luminous marks on this one are more visible even after a few hours--and it only takes seconds to charge up the luminosity with a flashlight. I put my old 22mm NATO band on with no trouble. FYI, the watchband's extra length makes it easy to wear over a wetsuit sleeve, even with neoprene gloves. This is a nice readable watch with no major frills and I shouldn't need to worry about it while showering, swimming, kayaking or washing the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: parhelion

product_meta.title: Citizen Men's BN0085
product_meta.description:
This brand new, world-class Citizen's Eco-Drive Diver's watch is powered by light and never needs a battery. This watch features accurate Japanese-quartz movement, durable hardened mineral crystal, date, and a water resistance of 30 ATM.

feature_bullets: ISO-certified diver watch with sunray design on inner dial and rubber band
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Eco drive technology is fueled by light and it never needs a battery
Features buckle closure, date window, unidirectional bezel, depth measurements, and protective mineral crystal dial window
Water resistant to 999 feet (300 M):suitable for scuba diving to a depth of 30 meters for up to 2 hours
